name: Assassin's Creed: Revelations - Mediterranean Traveler Map Pack
name_original: Assassin's Creed: Revelations - Mediterranean Traveler Map Pack
description:
Assassin's Creed: Revelations - Mediterranean Traveler Map Pack is an action game developed by Ubisoft Montreal. It was originally released in 2012. It was published by Ubisoft Entertainment. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Assassin's Creed: Revelations - Mediterranean Traveler Map Pack is available on PlayStation 3.
